title: Panel Registration is Now Open!
content:
Are you educated and enthusiastic about a specific topic of animé or Japanese culture? Do you enjoy entertaining and interacting with other fans of that topic? Come share your knowledge and creativity with your fellow attendees by hosting a panel!

Our Panel Registration form is now live! Panel submissions end on May 17th at 11:59pm. You will find out about the status of your panel by May 25th.
